decision_conditions:
1. The floor of the payphone should be level with the surrounding footway, paved to match the footway material and bonded into the existing pavement pattern. 

 2. Please ensure that the site supervisors refer to the Council's guidance notes on payphone installation to ensure a high quality finish and a satisfactory relationship to existing street furniture. 

 3. Please ensure all excavation near tree roots is carried out by hand to avoid cutting tree roots. For matters relating to street trees contact Vincent James Tel:0171 477 3878. 

 4. This approval is issued on the understanding that the costs of any future relocation, adjusting of level or removal of the payphone necessitated by highway works shall be met by the payphone operator/owner. 

 5. For all matters relating to existing street furniture, paving and installation details, contact Roger Estop on Tel: 0171 477 2267. 

 6. If you have any queries about statutory services, contact the relevant statutory undertaker direct. 

 7. Please ensure that the payphone is regularly and effectively cleaned in the interests of streetscene appearance.
